remarks: A restricted quantifier over an image set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ralrnmpt.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
ralrnmpt.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralrnmpt $p |- ( A. x e. A B e. V -> ( A. y e. ran F ps <-> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B y $.
$d F y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
